item.title: Example of CMake file for CUDA+CPP code
item.description: Makefiles are quite straightforward and easy to write (in reasonable situations). But GNU Make is not crossplafrom. CMake is cross-platform, cross-application (it can generate projects for different IDEs and Makefile itself).
